Package com.fyp.erpapi.erpapi.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.fyp.erpapi.erpapi.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
Service class for managing user-related operations such as registration, role assignment, and onboarding.

  • Method Details

    • loadUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String username) throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
      Loads a user by username (email in this context). This method is used by Spring Security during the authentication process.
      Specified by:
      loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
      Parameters:
      username - The email of the user to load.
      Returns:
      UserDetails of the user found by email.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • registerUser

      public org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.oidc.user.OidcUser registerUser(OIDCUserInformationDTO OIDCUserInformationDTO, org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.oidc.OidcIdToken idToken, org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.oidc.OidcUserInfo userInfo, SSOIssuer ssoIssuer) throws NoSuchRoleException, AlreadyExistsException
      Registers a new user with the information obtained from an OIDC authentication flow.
      Parameters:
      OIDCUserInformationDTO - Data transfer object containing user information from the OIDC provider.
      idToken - The OIDC ID token.
      userInfo - The OIDC user info.
      ssoIssuer - The issuer of the SSO.
      Returns:
      An OidcUser representing the newly registered user.
      Throws:
      NoSuchRoleException - If a necessary role does not exist.
      AlreadyExistsException - If the user already exists.

    • assignRolesToUser

      public void assignRolesToUser(UserRoleDTO userRoleDTO)
      Assigns roles to a user identified by email.
      Parameters:
      userRoleDTO - Data transfer object containing the email of the user and the roles to assign.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
